message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. I take $6000, you get $4000.
Your offer was a bit too imbalanced. Let's split more fairly, considering the inflation.
I understand the inflation concerns. This offer is a fair compromise, slightly better for me than your previous one.
Time is running out! This is my final offer - a perfectly even split. Let's end this before the inflation eats away at our potential gains.
